decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Design & Access Statement, 1307.005, 1307.006, 1307.007, 1307.001, 1307.002, 1307.003, 1307.004, 1307.008, 1307.000, Unnumbered Flood Risk Assessment, 1307.010, 1307.205 A, 1307.206 A, 1307.201 B,  1307.202 B, 1307.203 B, 1307.204 A, 1307.208 A, 1307.209 A, received 03/02/2014, Unnumbered 45 degree angle elevation, Unnumbered 45 degree angle plan, received 06/03/2014, 1307.207 Revision B, received 04/04/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extensions hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, a first floor side extension to rear and enlargement of existing rear roof extension.
